description:
Electrical Circuits course cover the following topics

1 - Definition of electricity , electrical current , voltage and power

2 - Analysis circuits using Ohm's Law

3 - Define current source and voltage source

4 - Analysis circuits using Network analysis ( Mesh current , Superposition , Thevenin Theorem and Norton's Theorem )

the course will be taught in front of white board

this course is a basics of electrical engineer and it help undergraduate engineers to get a better understanding of electricity and electrical circutis
title: مبادئ الدوائر الكهربية لطلاب الهندسة
